Print No. 320. Lithograph: "The American Privateer 'General Armstrong' Capt. Sam C. Reid..."
Print No. 320. Lithograph: "The American Privateer 'General Armstrong' Capt. Sam C. Reid..."

Full title: "The American Privateer 'General Armstrong' Capt. Sam C. Reid. In the Harbor of Fayol (Azores) Octr. 26th 1814. Repulsing the attack of 14 boats containing 400 men from the British Ships 'Plantagenet 74' 'Rota' 44 and 'Carnation' 18 Guns. The 'General Armstrong' was 246 tons burthen Carried 6 Nine pounders and a 'Long' Tom (42 pounder,) amid ships and a crew of 90 men. The British loss was 120 killed and 130 wounded â€“ Americans lost 2 killed and 7 wounded." Lithographed and published by N. Currier 152 Nassau Street, N.Y.
